headline: AEP Declares Quarterly Dividend on Common Stock
summary: The Board of Directors of American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of 95 cents per share on the company's common stock.

headline: AI Needs Power Now—Bloom Energy and American Electric Power Deliver
summary: Artificial intelligence data center demand is driving massive commercial contracts for fuel cell technology as utilities race to solve power shortages.

headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Valuation Check After US$2.65b AEP Fuel Cell Deal And Growth Partnerships
summary: Bloom Energy (BE) has been in focus after American Electric Power committed to a US$2.65b purchase of its solid oxide fuel cells, exercising an additional 900 MW option tied to a 2024 agreement. See our latest analysis for Bloom Energy. The AEP contract and other recent agreements have coincided with sharp gains, including a 68.32% 1 month share price return and a very large 1 year total shareholder return.
